msg: sometimes some elements were skipped during dtd->xsd translation causing validation errors (GERONIMO-3782)

author: dkulp
msg: [CXF-1405] Move setting up the incoming message into AbstractHTTPDestination so that jetty and servlet should always be consistent.
Update JAXRS to properly parse the Accept header
Fix a BUNCH of JAXRS tests that were not setting an Accept header so were now getting the default */* on the server side and getting json back.

msg: GERONIMO-3773 hostname lookup causes long startup time when offline
Set configuration to avoid DNS timeout issues when namingservice is launched.
